text:
<@U02M480SYCX> You won’t be able to do this if you’re keeping your non HubSpot-hosted content at www. Your subscription type might also be a factor.

You can keep the subdirectory but not the subdomain unless you are migrating your full site to CMS Hub.

> “If you’re keeping part of your website outside of HubSpot, do not connect that subdomain to HubSpot. For example, if your main website is hosted on WordPress at _<http://info.mywebsite.com|info.mywebsite.com>_, you should not connect your _info_ subdomain to HubSpot. Doing so will take down your external content.
<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/domains-and-urls/connect-a-domain-to-HubSpot>
